chapter.title: Beaker client
chapter.para: The shell based client provides users with mostly a subset of what is possible via the UI, although it does provide one or two things which the UI does not provide. To install beaker-client, type yum install beaker-client at the shell prompt. To verify it is working properly, type bkr list-labcontrollers into the shell. It should return a list of labcontrollers configured in Beaker.
To submit a Job enter bkr job-submit job_xml. If succesful, you will be shown the Job ID and the progress of your Job.
To watch a Job, enter bkr job-watch J:job_id.
To cancel a Job you have created, do this bkr job-cancel J:job_id
To show all Tasks available for a given distro, do this at the shell bkr task-list distro.
To add a Task, use this command bkr task-add task_rpm.
